basic.description:
European film is our starting point for investigating the connections between work and art. Topics include: urban space; (post- and para-); socialist societies; border crossings, especially gendered labour and cultural flows. This course will investigate how the new Europe and film shape each other.
NOTE    A screening will be made available each week for viewing films.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: LLCU
basic.title: Film in the New Europe

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     Level 2 or permission of the Dept of Languages, Literatures and Cultures
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from LLCU326; INTS326; GRMN426.
Equivalency    INTS326.
